page.title: 19A Day in the Life of Laila
page.content: At 7.00am my sister wakes me. I do exercises then I wash, get ready for school, make my bed and then go down for breakfast. I walk to school and meet some friends on the way. At school I have recorder practice first. We have assembly before lessons in Maths or English. At playtime I spend my time talking to my friends or playing with our sponge-ball. Dinner time is at 11.55 and afterwards we have general work such as History, Geography, Science, R.E. or Art. School finishes at 3.30pm. After school I spend my time watching television, practising Maths or English or playing out. After tea at 6.00pm I read or crochet. I go to bed at 9.30pm, read for an hour, then I fall asleep.
